course.title: MAT 5142 Algebra II: Groups and Galois Theory (3 units)
course.desc: Group actions, class equation, Sylow theorems, central, composition and derived series, Jordan-Holder theorem, field extensions and minimal polynomials, algebraic closure, separable extensions, integral ring extensions, Galois groups, fundamental theorem of Galois theory, finite fields, cyclotomic field extensions, fundamental theorem of algebra, transcendental extensions. This course is equivalent to MATH 5109 at Carleton University.Course Component: Lecture
